column4: has anyone had gtk-gnutella segfault the moment they click the "Download" button in the search results? I can confirm this on two separate hoary boxes.
could you obtain a backtrace via gdb ?
yes, it occurs in glib somewhere. :P
ok, please file a bug and let me know the bug #.
I'll look at it in 30 minutes.
it won't accept 'gtk-gnutella' in the "Package:" field, it seems. Is unknown appropriate?
I had to test on a couple architectures before uploading else it would have been up earlier.
